price: “(Sε modi nokorε ma amanfoͻ) a, Onyankopɔn deε a εbεka ama mo no, εno na εyε ma mo, sε moyε agyidiefoͻ ampa a. Na medeε menyε mo so hwεfoͻ’’.
arabic: بَقِيَّتُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيۡكُم بِحَفِيظٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: baqiyyatu al-lahi khayrun lakum in kuntum mu'minīna wamā anā ʿalaykum biḥafīẓin
